Quetzalcoatl/Windlord::

Windlord tried to reach the tunnel but fell due his wounds. 
Quetzalcoatl moved towards him and looking to Starstomp 
said "Starstomp, Help Windlord to come in to the tunnel, I will cover 
you !!!"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur/Terrataur::
>        He watches the monitor and winces.  He opens a com to 
Terrataur.  
> "Terrataur, I need you to go out side and get Windlord, 
Quetzalcoatl, and 
> Starstomp inhere with one of your tunnels.
> 
>        She receives the com.  "Acknowledged."  She digs a tunnel 
outside to 
> the fighting, planting bombs behind her to collapse the tunnel in 
case of 
> invasion.  "Hey!  GET IN HERE!  NOW!"
